name: Mike Anderson
details: I rarely like to write reviews, but the Nilesh truly deserve this for his support, customisation and most importantly, friendliness and professionalism. Many thanks once again for everything and hope that I get to deal with you again in the near future.

name: Keita Smith
details: Really the Code Quality, Support, and design are awesome and its good support they are giving. They give an instant solution to our needs. Really awesome. I will strongly recommend to my friends. Simply amazing! Thank you!

name: Alan Walker
details: Loved the template design, documentation, customizability and the support from Nilesh! I am a noob in programming with very little knowledge about coding but the he helped me to launch my website successfully. Much recommended!
